snippet: Penn State’s board of trustees and new president focused on repairing the university’s image and braced for financial backlash in the aftermath of the child sexual abuse scandal.
abstract: Penn State’s board of trustees and new president focus on repairing the university’s image and braces for financial backlash in the aftermath of the child sexual abuse scandal; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Penn State’s board of trustees and new president focused on repairing the university’s image and braced for financial backlash in the aftermath of the child sexual abuse scandal.

headline.seo: Memos Show Penn State Tried to Repair Image

headline.print_headline: Penn State Scandal Response Is Detailed
